JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description:   W2S Solutions is looking for a Software QA engineers to own and execute the below.   Responsibilities:    Good communication skill   Analyzing users stories and/use cases/requirements for validity and feasibility   Collaborate closely with other team members and departments   Execute all levels of testing (System, Integration, and Regression)   Design and develop automation scripts when needed   Detect and track software defects and inconsistencies   Provide timely solutions   Apply quality engineering principals throughout the Agile product lifecycle   Provide support and documentation
